message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product. I would like to propose a price of $90 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're trying to get a good deal. However, I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. However, I still think the product is worth more than $95. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $105.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob. However, I still think the product is worth a bit more than $100. I'm willing to meet you at $102.50.
Thank you for considering my offers, Alice. I believe we are getting closer to a fair price. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $102 for the product.
I'm almost there, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $101.50. This is my final offer.
